jcr:content.jcr:description: The Altra Timp 3 makes your dirt adventures comfortable. With a high-cushioned midsole and maximum traction, youâ€™ll enjoy your trail run, wherever it takes you.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Timp 3
jcr:content.pageTitle: The Mid-Cushion Neutral Trail Runner - Timp 3 | Altra Running

video.description: Woman running on a trail in the Altra Timp 3
video.name: Altra Running Timp 3

customhtml2.customHTML:
Designed for the dirt, the Timp 3 is ready for any trail, any time.

MAXIMUM TRACTION

Don't be fooled by its plush comfort: the Timp 3 is one tough trail shoe. And thanks to its grippy MaxTracâ„¢ outsole and a multi-directional lug pattern, you can say goodbye to slips and slides.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
HIGH MILEAGE

The Timp 3 is designed for long distance trail runs, but it only takes a couple steps for you to feel the difference. Thanks to its soft, high-cushioned midsole, this runner will take you where you need to go.

image.alt: Instep shot of Altra Running Timp 3

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPEâ„¢ COMFORT

Our signature FootShapeâ„¢ comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.
